Type.Name: CancelClickedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CancelClickedHandler(object o, CancelClickedArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the CancelClickedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the CancelClickedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the CancelClickedHandler is removed from the event.
